TopicTitle: KSP is the sub forum of the day over at Reddit!

Articles.Content:
We got picked as Sub Reddit Of The Day for today over on Reddit.com.

Stop by and check out the great community of KSP players they have there.

http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/1isi8s/hey_rkerbalspaceprogram_youre_subreddit_of_the/

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
